participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic about trying new experiences, especially when it comes to food and travel.
participant_1.background: i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i've been traveling the world for a years. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it.
